file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-21-05-05 - TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TWO-WAY CHECK TEE VALVES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the two-way check tee valves. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY TWO-WAY CHECK VALVES - FUNCTION- ALL 26-21-05-700-801-A ♦ AL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-21-05 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-21-05-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TWO-WAY CHECK VALVES - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) To do the check, it is necessary to remove the two-way check valves from the fire extinguishing bottle. (2) To do the task, refer to the instructions in Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-42-00/100 - AMM TASK 26-21-05-000-801-A/400 TWO-WAY CHECK VALVE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 26-21-05-400-801-A/400 TWO-WAY CHECK VALVE - INSTALLATION Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM 26-21-34 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 312 312AR Tail cone compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the tail cone compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • FIRE EXTG BTL A 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-21-05 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • FIRE EXTG BTL B 1/2. (2) Put the ladder in the work area. (3) Open the access door 312AR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100) to get access to the tail cone compartment. (4) Remove the two-way check tee valves (AMM TASK 26-21-05-000-801-A/400). J. Functionally Check Two-Way "Tee" Check Valves SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do a check on the two-way check tee valves. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific Abbreviated CMM 26-21-34. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the two-way check tee valves (AMM TASK 26-21-05-400-801-A/400). (2) Close the access door 312AR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). (3) Remove the ladder. (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • FIRE EXTG BTL A 1/2. • FIRE EXTG BTL B 1/2. (5) On the EICAS display, make sure that the messages below are not shown. • E1 EXT BTLA INOP. • E1 EXT BTLB INOP. • E2 EXT BTLA INOP. • E2 EXT BTLB INOP. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-21-05 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
